item.title: WATCH: Former ICE director reveals what goes into agency’s decisions on cities to target
item.description: Former acting U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement Director John Sandweg shared insight about how the agency selects the next city for operations.

item.title: Trump says US should have tested NATO by invoking Article 5 over border security
item.description: President Trump suggested the U.S. should have tested NATO’s commitment by invoking Article 5 in response to the southern border crisis.

item.title: Top 5 moments from Jack Smith's testimony on Capitol Hill
item.description: Jack Smith testifies before House Judiciary Committee, facing Republican criticism over Trump prosecutions while defending his cases as apolitical.
